name: relogmuld

stmt.origin: syl2anc(w0, wceq(cfv(clog, co(c0, cmul, c1)), co(cfv(clog, c0), caddc, cfv(clog, c1))), wcel(c0, crp), wcel(c1, crp))

|- wi(w0, wceq(cfv(clog, co(c0, cmul, c1)), co(cfv(clog, c0), caddc, cfv(clog, c1))))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c0, crp))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c1, crp))

body.origin: |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, crp), wcel(c1, crp)), wceq(cfv(clog, co(c0, cmul, c1)), co(cfv(clog, c0), caddc, cfv(clog, c1))))

comment: The natural logarithm of the product of two positive real numbers is the sum of natural logarithms. Property 2 of [Cohen] p. 301, restricted to natural logarithms. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 29-May-2016.)
